channel.title: United pkz server info: PvP Features -PK following (Ranged, Mele
channel.description:
united pkz server info: PvP Features -PK following (Ranged, Melee, Magic) -MANY new emotes added. (Including Vengeance, GS, All whip and rune cross bow emotes grapic.) -Edgeville Wilderness, with a master portal added to teleport anywhere in the wilderness & in the game -99.9% PvP Armors and PvP Weapons with Special attacks and effects -Wilderness obelisks work 100% Vestas longsword has an amazing special - (everyone and cheaper for donatiors) -The vengeance GFX is 100% animated. -All whips and ranging eqipiment gfx are 100% animated. -Perfect PvP Wilderness levels -Fixed dark bow spec -piles of pkers in the wilderness -Great Combat system(And still working on more features) -Rune crossbow emote with dragon bolt special attack.
Player vs Monster Features -100% Dagganoth kings with real like effects -Full Godwars Dungeon with teaming and Real boss/minion Gfx and emotes -Metal Dragons -Slayer monsters who give good drops -Tormented Demon who drops Dragon claws -Kalphite Queen -King Black Dragon -Mithril Dragon -Chaos Elemental
Minigame Features -Barrows is fully working -Tzharr fight pits is 100% -8 wave jad minigame -Pest Control revamped coming soon -Assault minigame -choas minigame(new minigame in process) Quest Features -all quest are done.. -Custom wepeons and armor (over 10k customs) -None of them are pre-made Delta quests -More events added monthly
Skilling and Other Features -All Skills work -Slayer updated with player-monster task precision. -Website highscores (in process) -Every NPC talks (with up to 10 random dialogues) -Home is edgeville -all items on death..x loging is now fixed! -Relatively fast training (1350xp/hit) -Wonderful staff -Gambling system - drop partys every week! -Money making can be a challenge. Find the right ways to be rich. -Characters show correct proportions in the equipment screen -over 1000 ways to make money!
server website:unitedpvp.tk
dl cleint-www.mediafire.com/?hm2m0u5zkqz

item.title: United pkz server info: PvP Features -PK following (Ranged, Mele
item.dc:creator: @united_pkz1 united pkz
item.description:
@united_pkz1 wrote:

            united pkz server info:

PvP Features
-PK following (Ranged, Melee, Magic)
-MANY new emotes added. (Including Vengeance, GS, All whip and rune cross bow emotes grapic.)
-Edgeville Wilderness, with a master portal added to teleport anywhere in the wilderness & in the game
-99.9% PvP Armors and PvP Weapons with Special attacks and effects
-Wilderness obelisks work 100%
Vestas longsword has an amazing special - (everyone and cheaper for donatiors)
-The vengeance GFX is 100% animated.
-All whips and ranging eqipiment gfx are 100% animated.
-Perfect PvP Wilderness levels
-Fixed dark bow spec
-piles of pkers in the wilderness
-Great Combat system(And still working on more features)
-Rune crossbow emote with dragon bolt special attack.

Player vs Monster Features
-100% Dagganoth kings with real like effects
-Full Godwars Dungeon with teaming and Real boss/minion Gfx and emotes
-Metal Dragons
-Slayer monsters who give good drops
-Tormented Demon who drops Dragon claws
-Kalphite Queen
-King Black Dragon
-Mithril Dragon
-Chaos Elemental

Minigame Features
-Barrows is fully working
-Tzharr fight pits is 100%
-8 wave jad minigame
-Pest Control revamped coming soon
-Assault minigame
-choas minigame(new minigame in process)
Quest Features
-all quest are done…
-Custom wepeons and armor (over 10k customs)
-None of them are pre-made Delta quests
-More events added monthly

Skilling and Other Features
-All Skills work
-Slayer updated with player-monster task precision.
-Website highscores (in process)
-Every NPC talks (with up to 10 random dialogues)
-Home is edgeville
-all items on death…x loging is now fixed!
-Relatively fast training (1350xp/hit)
-Wonderful staff
-Gambling system - drop partys every week!
-Money making can be a challenge. Find the right ways to be rich.
-Characters show correct proportions in the equipment screen
-over 1000 ways to make money!

server website:unitedpvp.tk

dl cleint-www.mediafire.com/?hm2m0u5zkqz
